tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (EX There)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (DT no) (JJR greater) (NN sorrow)) (SBAR (IN than) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB recall) (PP (IN in) (NP (NN misery))) (NP-TMP (DT the) (NN time)) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (PRP we)) (VP (VBD were) (ADJP (JJ happy))))))))))) (. .)))
